multiplechoiceresponse.label: PMs need to be prepared to deal with Non-straight-forward tasks (NSF). Which of the below best describes the characteristics of such tasks:

choicegroup.choice: Technology is utilized - e.g. Use a link to access a folder and download a copy of a document.
Team members are involved - e.g. request an update on the progress from a responsible team

Information is not readily available and PM may need to work with people multiple times - e.g. PM needs to obtain an approval by the IT manager on their estimate of hours needed to develop a specific software.
Tasks that always take a lot of time.
